titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain legal fees and investment fees to be taken into account as miscellaneous itemized deductions.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain legal fees and investment fees to be taken into account as miscellaneous itemized deductions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows certain legal and investment fees to be currently taken into account as miscellaneous itemized deductions despite the suspension of such deductions after 2017 and before 2026.
